description:
***New Course Launched March 24th: Already 600+ Students Happily Enrolled***

ACTUAL STUDENT REVIEWS

"I found this course to be a good overview of many important topics that you need to understand to become a good poker player. The subjects highlighted many aspects that I now realize I need to further learn and become competent at. Overall a worthwhile course which has given me an appetite to view Alton's other poker courses." - John

"What every winning poker player needs to understand." - Steve

THIS IS NOT YOUR AVERAGE POKER COURSE

This course is much different than that.

In this course, you’ll learn Overarching Poker Concepts and Theories that many other poker courses fail to mention:

  • Chance Favors the Prepared Mind
  • Making Fewer Mistakes Than Your Opponents
  • The Path to the Thinking Poker Player
  • Traits of Successful Poker Players
  • Not Having to Be The Best
  • And Much More…


You’ll also learn Why People Fail to Beat the Game:

  • Applying Ineffective Strategies and Tactics
  • Getting Too Emotionally Involved
  • Playing Too Many Hands
  • Played Scared Poker
  • Bluffing Without a Solid Reason
  • And Much More…


And you’ll be provided a Framework for Success:

  • Being Patient
  • Having Realistic Expectations
  • Always Having a Plan
  • Striving for Unconscious Competence
  • Striking a Balance Between Poker & Life
  • And Much More…


That is what makes the course so important!

LEARN WHAT IT TAKES TO BECOME A WINNING POKER PLAYER
Poker is not a game for the faint of heart.

Lots of people fail to beat the game for a variety of reasons.

This course will prevent you for doing so…

In fact, it will teach you what it takes to become a good, winning poker player!

  • Learn about the Basic Poker Truths
  • Understand Why People Fail to Beat the Game
  • Learn about Seven Common Beginner Mistakes and Solutions
  • Learn the Winning Poker Basic Game Plan


SO WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?

ENROLL TODAY, YOUR 100% RISK-FREE ENROLLMENT IS BACKED BY UDEMY'S 30-DAY, NO QUESTIONS ASKED, MONEY BACK GUARANTEE!

TO PREVIEW SELECT LECTURES FROM THIS COURSE, JUST SCROLL DOWN BELOW AND CLICK THE BLUE PREVIEW BUTTONS.
title: The Poker Blueprint: Learn to Play Good Poker
